mapper.sql: id, logic_id, `name`, expression, cluster, rack, shard, shard_routing, version, role, status, config, create_time, update_time, region_id
mapper.insert: insert into index_template_physical_info (logic_id, `name`, expression, cluster, rack, shard, shard_routing, version, role, config, region_id) values (#{logicId}, #{name}, #{expression}, #{cluster}, #{rack}, #{shard}, #{shardRouting}, #{version}, #{role}, #{config}, #{regionId})
mapper.select:
select
from index_template_physical_info where id = #{physicalId} and status > 0

select
from index_template_physical_info where id = #{physicalId} and (status = 1 or status = -1)

select
from index_template_physical_info where logic_id = #{logicId} and status > 0

select
from index_template_physical_info where `name` = #{name} and status > 0

select
from index_template_physical_info where status > 0 and logic_id in #{id}

select
from index_template_physical_info where status > 0 and id in #{id}

select
from index_template_physical_info where status = #{status} and cluster LIKE CONCAT(#{cluster},'%')

select
from index_template_physical_info where `name` = #{name} and cluster = #{cluster} and status > 0
select id, logic_id from index_template_physical_info where `status` > 0
mapper.delete: delete from index_template_physical_info where `name` = #{name} and cluster = #{cluster} and status < 0
mapper.select:
select
from index_template_physical_info where region_id = #{regionId} and status > 0
